SELECT c.id, c.name, c.type, c.value, COUNT(uc.id) as used_count FROM coupon c JOIN user_coupon uc ON c.id = uc.coupon_id WHERE uc.use_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND uc.status = 2 -- 假设2表示已使用 GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.type, c.value ORDER BY used_count DESC

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.type, c.value, c.min_amount, COUNT(uc.id) as receive_count, COALESCE(SUM(IF(uc.status = 2, 1, 0)), 0) as used_count, ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(IF(uc.status = 2, 1, 0)) * 100.0 / COUNT(uc.id), 0), 2) as use_rate FROM coupon c JOIN user_coupon uc ON c.id = uc.coupon_id GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.type, c.value, c.min_amount ORDER BY receive_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.type, c.value, COUNT(uc.id) AS total_received, SUM(IF(uc.status = 1, 1, 0)) AS unused_count, SUM(IF(uc.status = 2, 1, 0)) AS used_count, ROUND(SUM(IF(uc.status = 2, 1, 0)) * 100.0 / COUNT(uc.id), 2) AS usage_rate, SUM(IF(uc.status = 2, o.total_amount, 0)) AS total_order_amount, SUM(IF(uc.status = 2, 1, 0)) AS order_count, ROUND(SUM(IF(uc.status = 2, o.total_amount, 0)) / SUM(IF(uc.status = 2, 1, 0)), 2) AS avg_order_amount FROM coupon c LEFT JOIN user_coupon uc ON c.id = uc.coupon_id LEFT JOIN orders o ON uc.order_id = o.id WHERE c.id = #{couponId} GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.type, c.value
